keyMoments.title: Luffy Declares Nami His Friend
keyMoments.description: Luffy publicly declares Nami his friend and crewmate after defeating Arlong.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the concept of nakama as a core value of the Straw Hat Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Nami Officially Joins the Straw Hat Pirates
keyMoments.description: Nami officially accepts Luffy's invitation and becomes a permanent member of the crew as their navigator.
keyMoments.significance: The crew gains its essential navigator, completing the core early members needed for the Grand Line journey.

keyMoments.title: Straw Hats Force Nezumi to Arrest Arlong
keyMoments.description: The crew confronts corrupt Marine Captain Nezumi and forces him to arrest Arlong and return stolen wealth to the villagers.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's commitment to justice over legality, establishing them as liberators who fight for what's right.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates gain their essential navigator when Nami officially joins in this episode. With five members now, the crew is better prepared for their eventual journey to the Grand Line.
goals: Help each crew member achieve their dreams

keyMoments.title: Defeat of Captain Arlong
keyMoments.description: Captain Arlong is defeated by Luffy, ending the crew's reign of terror over the East Blue.
keyMoments.significance: The defeat and arrest of Arlong marks the end of the Arlong Pirates as an active threat.

keyMoments.title: Arlong Pirates Arrested
keyMoments.description: The Arlong Pirates are arrested by Marine Captain Nezumi after being forced to by the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Official disbanding of the crew through arrest by Marine forces.

description: The Arlong Pirates are defeated and arrested in this episode, ending their eight-year reign of terror over the Conomi Islands. Their captain Arlong is beaten by Luffy and their headquarters Arlong Park is destroyed.
